returns._0: the maximum amount of seconds that a operator table can be in the past for a given operatorSet

updateOperatorTable((address,uint32),uin.details: only callable by the operatorTableUpdater for the given operatorSetThe `referenceTimestamp` must be greater than the latest reference timestamp for the given operatorSet

params.operatorSet: the operatorSet to update the operator table for
params.operatorSetInfo: the operatorInfos to update the operator table with
params.referenceTimestamp: the timestamp at which the operatorInfos were sourced

params.operatorSet: the operatorSet that the certificate is for

returns.signedStakes: amount of stake that signed the certificate for each stake type

params.operatorSet: the operatorSet that the certificate is for
params.totalStakeNominalThresholds: the nominal amount of stake that the signed stake of the certificate should meet

returns._0: whether or not certificate is valid and meets thresholds

params.operatorSet: the operatorSet that the certificate is for
params.totalStakeProportionThresholds: the proportion of total stake that the signed stake of the certificate should meet

returns._0: whether or not certificate is valid and meets thresholds

getOperatorSetOwner((address,uint32)).notice: the address of the owner of the OperatorSet

latestReferenceTimestamp((address,uint32.notice: The latest reference timestamp of the operator table for a given operatorSet

verifyCertificateNominal((address,uint32.notice: verifies a certificate and makes sure that the signed stakes meet provided nominal stake thresholds

verifyCertificateProportion((address,uin.notice: verifies a certificate and makes sure that the signed stakes meet provided portions of the total stake on the AVS
